Author: sadstressedpumpkin
Text: Unfortunately I’ve never been close to underweight. Just always been normal or a bit overweight, but I do still miss my teenage body from when I first lost weight.  Now it’s so hard to lose weight. :/

Author: jigsawpirate
Text: I think 8yrs is about how long it takes to have a couple of episodes where you will become quite ill/thin as a result of an ED, and you later transition into becoming physically recovered but not mentally w/ PTSD from the ED so your body image is the pits from the reflections you have of being thinner and the impression it makes on your overall psyche- I felt the same way 8yrs into my ED, couldn't lose a lb, lots of negative voices in my head, physically recovered but mentally a wreck
